AND:     00011011 & 01111101 = 00011001
OR:      00011011 | 01111101 = 01111111
XOR:     00011011 ^ 01111101 = 01100110
NOT:    ~00011011= 11100100
ROTATIONS: 
 RIGHT rotations
110110001101
11011000110
1101100011
110110001
LEFT rotations: 
00110110
01101100
11011000
110110001
SIGN-EXTENDING ARITHMETIC SHIFT RIGHT: 
00001101
10000110
11000011
01100001
